text: Alexander "Alex" R. Brearley (8 February 1913 - 8 September 2001) was a British canoeist who competed in the 1936 Summer Olympics. In 1936 he and his partner John Dudderidge finished ninth in the folding K-2 10000 m event. ==References== *Alex Brearley's profile at Sports Reference.com Category:1913 births Category:2001 deaths Category:Canoeists at the 1936 Summer Olympics Category:British male canoeists Category:Olympic canoeists of Great Britain
title: Alex Brearley
